products.title: Napa Blackout Stone Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Elegant and fashion forward, the napa blackout range is a luxuriously striped fabric. Choose between contemporary tones to get the perfect fit for your home. Napa blackout fabric offers complete light blocking properties, ensuring complete light control for your space. products.title: Galaxy Solar Blackout Silver Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Galaxy solar is the range of blinds made from pleated fabric that will add more texture to your room. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. Product id: db-pls0047 fabric colour: silver material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.

products.title: Hive Silkweave Blackout Ash Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: This blackout textured fabric features a stripe within its pattern. Hive silkweave would look in place in a kitchen or conservatory with added green plants to add to the bohemian feel. This fabric features a honey-combed structure, meaning the guide wires are hidden from view. Product id: db-pls0115 fabric colour: ash material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.

products.title: Hive Matrix Blackout Silver Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Hive blackout matrix is a textured honey-combed pleated fabric. Due to it's comb-structure, the guide wires are hidden within the blind, adding a cleaner finish to this lovely fabric. Product id: db-pls0114 fabric colour: silver material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric. Control type: pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes hive matrix blackout silver pleated skylight blind in grey.

products.title: Lexington Blockout Taupe Solar/thermal Pleated Free-hanging Blind
products.description: Their lexington collection of thermal perfect fit pleated blinds is both luxurious and practical. Featuring their thermal fabric technology - these blinds keep your home warm in the winter whilst still maintaining the sophisticated look of pleated blinds. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds their lexington collection is ideal because of the celluar technology - honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit the heat transfer from your windows.
